## DescribeMetadata interface

DescribeMetadata provides static type checking for a [Command](./jambo.command.md)<!-- -->'s describe(), and ensures that the return value matches the same shape as the [Command](./jambo.command.md)<!-- -->'s args.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export default interface DescribeMetadata<T extends ArgumentMetadataRecord = ArgumentMetadataRecord> 
```
